questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) Inside a museum or theater
D) In a residential area

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A statue in a (exhibit or theatre) indoor display
D) A movie theatre

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A landscape
B) A statue
C) A group of people
D) A building

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A statue
C) A car
D) A lake

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) Posters and a theater entrance
C) A river
D) A city skyline

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A flower bed
B) A statue with some objects
C) A bicycle
D) A bench

What does the statue appear to be holding?
A) A sword and shield
B) A book and a cup
C) A musical instrument
D) A piece of fruit

What objects are at the base of the statue?
A) Flowers
B) Bottles
C) Stones
D) Shoes

A) Wooden
B) Carpeted and tiled
C) Grass
D) Sand

A) Paintings
B) Posters
C) Windows
D) Mirrors

A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

A) Blue
B) Red
C) Green
D) Yellow

A) White
B) Black
C) Gray
D) Brown

B) 6-10

B) Movies

D) Sports

D) Red
